comments.raw_text: In OS X 10.7 floating panels with titlebars (like the one in the Inspector's HTML panel) do not receive mouse clicks. Attempts to focus the panel result in the click event "falling through" the panel to whatever's positioned underneath it. Most confusing.
comments.creator: rcampbell@mozilla.com
